name: Stars & Black Holes
description:
NEW! Version 4.0

Merge stars in six directions. Develop and learn strategy on a small hexagonal grid (2 cells on each side.) Then, choose regular (or large) grid 3 (or 4) cells on each side for greater challenge.

• At each turn (epoch), choose a direction to move stars.

• Certain pairs of stars combine adding to your score. (Hint: Some combinations score more than others.)

• Stars that can't combine will move if not blocked.

• Adopt a strategy that doesn't block all movement, otherwise the game may end.

• If you do very well, you will "see" black holes. Use them to your advantage.
